00001	//-----------------------------------------------------------
00002	//
00003	//-----------------------------------------------------------
00004	class XIIISoloMutator extends Mutator;
00005	
00006	//_____________________________________________________________________________
00007	function bool CheckRelevance(Actor Other)
00008	{
00009	    // ELR Optimiza, dynamic load mesh for weapons at the init
00010	    if ( (XIIIWeaponPickup(Other) != none) && (class<XIIIWeapon>(XIIIWeaponPickup(Other).InventoryType).default.MeshName != "") )
00011	    {
00012	      DynamicLoadObject(class<XIIIWeapon>(XIIIWeaponPickup(Other).InventoryType).default.MeshName, class'mesh');
00013	    }
00014	    if ( (XIIIDecoPickup(Other) != none) && (class<XIIIWeapon>(XIIIDecoPickup(Other).InventoryType).default.MeshName != "") )
00015	    {
00016	      DynamicLoadObject(class<XIIIWeapon>(XIIIDecoPickup(Other).InventoryType).default.MeshName, class'mesh');
00017	    }
00018	    if ( (XIIIPickup(Other) != none) && (class<XIIIItems>(XIIIPickup(Other).InventoryType)!=none) && (class<XIIIItems>(XIIIPickup(Other).InventoryType).default.MeshName!="") )
00019	    {
00020	      DynamicLoadObject(class<XIIIItems>(XIIIPickup(Other).InventoryType).default.MeshName, class'mesh');
00021	    }
00022	    return Super.CheckRelevance(other);
00023	}
00024	
00025	
00026	
00027	defaultproperties
00028	{
00029	     DefaultWeaponName="XIII.Fists"
00030	}
End Source Code
